name: EAI – Elementor Animation Interactive
author: Denis O.

sections.description:
Elevate your Elementor pages to new heights with the EAI – Elementor Animation Interactive plugin. This powerful tool integrates seamlessly with Elementor, allowing you to incorporate mesmerizing ThreeJS animations directly into your website. Whether you’re looking to add interactive particles, dynamic geometries, or fluid simulations, EAI makes it possible without requiring any coding knowledge.

Key features include:
Particle Sphere: Create dynamic 3D particle spheres.
Staggered Cubes: Add interactive, animated cube grids that can enhance your site’s visual appeal.
Wavy Lines: Introduce soothing animated backgrounds with flowing lines to make your sections stand out.
Liquid Metal: Implement a futuristic, fluid metallic effect, adding a high-tech touch to your design.
Twisted Colorful Sphere: Feature a vibrant, rotating 3D sphere composed of twisting colors to captivate your visitors.

Third-Party Services

Vimeo Video Hosting

Our plugin uses Vimeo to host tutorial videos.

Vimeo Terms of Service:
– Vimeo Terms of Service

Vimeo Privacy Policy:
– Vimeo Privacy Policy
sections.faq:
Can I customize the animations?

Yes, all the animation widgets are fully customizable. You can adjust the colors, size, and even the animation speed directly from the Elementor interface.

Do I need coding knowledge to use this plugin?

No, the plugin is designed to be user-friendly and does not require any coding knowledge. You can add and customize animations directly from the Elementor page builder interface.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release. Features Particle Sphere, Staggered Cubes, Wavy Lines, Liquid Metal, and Twisted Colorful Sphere widgets.

short_description: Enhance Elementor with stunning ThreeJS animations. Add interactive 3D content effortlessly.

upgrade_notice.1.0: This is the first release of the plugin, bringing customizable ThreeJS animations to your Elementor pages. Enjoy the new level of interactivity and visual appeal!

screenshots.caption: The plugin page where you can see a short tutorial on how to use it
The Particle Sphere widget in action, showing a dynamic 3D particle system.
Example of the Staggered Cubes widget, demonstrating interactive cube animations.
The Wavy Lines widget adding a soothing animated background to a section.
The Liquid Metal widget, illustrating a mesmerizing, fluid metallic effect that responds to user interactions, providing a futuristic feel to any web page.
